Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller

Class StartingSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller.StartingSceneController
public class StartingSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
The controller of the starting scene, the scene where the client creates the connection with the server

      private void tryConnection​(java.lang.String userProposal) throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the ClientSocket and the connection with the server then sends a VC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent to the server an
      Parameters:
      userProposal - the username chosen by the player
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it fails to create and initialize the ClientSocket and the connection with the server
